what's Harri Events? It looks like such a cool feature!
My profile tells them everything so I don't waste my time- it has my availability, references, resume, pictures, and a short intro of myself.
Basically tells me everything about a position and the company on one page.
You can get invited to jobs! Does half the work of applying!
Keeps track of all the jobs I already applied and passed on and also the ones i was invited to and saved for later.
It's hard to get a job for the first time but this app gives you a good chance of finding something for sure.
Setting up an interview is so much easier than emails and voicemails back and forth.
adding jobs that i like to a short list and going back to it is a big thing

too many intersting jobs that you can easily apply for

once you have a profile you're set and can swipe away.
